comment.author: 47264147@N00
comment._content: Alfonso, Prince of Asturias. He was born in 1907, so possibly taken later than 1910, about 1913-15? Some pictures of him in Hutton Archives/ Getty images. www.gettyimages.com/ Editorial: 3269242. 1912 Editorial: 3299946 1928

comment.author: 59905404@N02
comment._content: Alfonso, Prince of Asturias, son of King Alfonso XIII and Queen Victoria Eugenia. He renounced his rights on the throne in 1933 to marry a commoner.
